scripts.test: RUST_LOG=info TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=error RUST_BACKTRACE=1 TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.b: cd .. && cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && dna-util -c ./kizuna.dna.workdir && cd tests
scripts.build:dna: cd .. && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack dna
